alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Hale; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 13 at 10:15PM CDT until April 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... Northeastern Hale County in west central Alabama... West central Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1015 PM CDT, a tornado producing storm was located over Low Gap, or 14 miles west of Brent, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Low Gap, Harmon, Pearson and Hagler. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
